verses.verse: A Psalm of David. Hear <S%H8085><s%> my prayer <S%H8605><s%>, O Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>; Give ear <S%H238><s%> to my supplications <S%H8469><s%>: In thy faithfulness <S%H530><s%> answer <S%H6030><s%> me <S%H6666><s%>, and in thy righteousness.
And enter <S%H935><s%> not into judgment <S%H4941><s%> with thy servant <S%H5650><s%>; For in thy sight <S%H6440><s%> no man living <S%H2416><s%> is righteous <S%H6663><s%>.

For the enemy <S%H341><s%> hath persecuted <S%H7291><s%> my soul <S%H5315><s%>; He hath smitten <S%H1792><s%> my life <S%H2416><s%> down <S%H1792><s%> to the ground <S%H776><s%>: He hath made me to dwell <S%H3427><s%> in dark <S%H4285><s%> places <S%H5769><s%>, as those that have been long dead <S%H4191><s%>.
Therefore is my spirit <S%H7307><s%> overwhelmed <S%H5848><s%> within me <S%H3820><s%>; My heart within <S%H8432><s%> me is desolate <S%H8074><s%>.

I remember <S%H2142><s%> the days <S%H3117><s%> of old <S%H6924><s%>; I meditate <S%H1897><s%> on all thy doings <S%H6467><s%>; I muse <S%H7878><s%> on the work <S%H4639><s%> of thy hands <S%H3027><s%>.
I spread forth <S%H6566><s%> my hands <S%H3027><s%> unto thee <S%H5315><s%>: My soul thirsteth after thee <S%H5889><s%>, as a weary land <S%H776><s%>. <S%H5542><s%>[[Selah

Make haste <S%H4118><s%> to answer <S%H6030><s%> me <S%H3068><s%>, O Jehovah; My spirit <S%H7307><s%> faileth <S%H3615><s%>: Hide <S%H5641><s%> not thy face <S%H6440><s%> from me <S%H4911><s%>, Lest I become like them that go down <S%H3381><s%> into the pit <S%H953><s%>.

Cause me to hear <S%H8085><s%> thy lovingkindness <S%H2617><s%> in the morning <S%H1242><s%>; For in thee do I trust <S%H982><s%>: Cause me to know <S%H3045><s%> the way <S%H1870><s%> wherein <S%H2098><s%> I should walk <S%H3212><s%>; For I lift up <S%H5375><s%> my soul unto thee <S%H5315><s%>.
Deliver <S%H5337><s%> me <S%H3068><s%>, O Jehovah, from mine enemies <S%H341><s%>: I flee unto thee to hide me <S%H3680><s%>.

Teach <S%H3925><s%> me to do <S%H6213><s%> thy will <S%H7522><s%>; For thou art my God <S%H430><s%>: Thy Spirit <S%H7307><s%> is good <S%H2896><s%>; Lead <S%H5148><s%> me in the land <S%H776><s%> of uprightness <S%H4334><s%>.
Quicken <S%H2421><s%> me <S%H3068><s%>, O Jehovah, for thy name <S%H8034><s%>'s sake <S%H6666><s%>: In thy righteousness bring <S%H3318><s%> my soul <S%H5315><s%> out of trouble <S%H6869><s%>.

And in thy lovingkindness <S%H2617><s%> cut off <S%H6789><s%> mine enemies <S%H341><s%>, And destroy <S%H6><s%> all them that afflict <S%H6887><s%> my soul <S%H5315><s%>; For I am thy servant <S%H5650><s%>.
